query: SELECT 'livres' as tipo, COUNT(*) as total FROM relatorios_livres WHERE dataVisita >= '2026-02-01 00:00:00' AND dataVisita <= '2026-02-28 23:59:59' UNION ALL SELECT 'completos' as tipo, COUNT(*) as total FROM relatorios_completos WHERE dataVisita >= '2026-02-01 00:00:00' AND dataVisita <= '2026-02-28 23:59:59';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT 'livres' as tipo, COUNT(*) as total FROM relatorios_livres WHERE dataVisita >= '2026-02-01 00:00:00' AND dataVisita <= '2026-02-28 23:59:59' UNION ALL SELECT 'completos' as tipo, COUNT(*) as total FROM relatorios_completos WHERE dataVisita >= '2026-02-01 00:00:00' AND dataVisita <= '2026-02-28 23:59:59';
